project_tech_stack.text: WordPress, CSS(3), SASS, JavaScript & jQuery, Greensock, JustGiving & Ebay APIs

project_main_text.text: Helmets for Heroines is a motorcycle event dedicated to raising awareness and charity for Breast Cancer Care UK as well as promoting female riders. This is a small website to promote a motorcycle ride, event and 20 beautiful artist made helmets up for a charity auction. All the helmets on the site have 360 rotation capabilities. The site also includes subtle parallax movement, animation and is fully responsive.
